title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 18.5 - Miscellaneous requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 18.5 - Miscellaneous requirements

State Regulations

Bleachers or similar structures at a public function must be safe. If the public function is also a place of public assembly or other place or activity subject to regulation by the New York State Department of Labor, then the permit-issuing official may seek information from that agency to aid evaluation of the safety of such structures. comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
